```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(rvest)

set.seed(10)

iris_with_missing = iris %>% 
  map_df(~replace(.x, sample(1:150, 20), NA)) %>%
  mutate(Species = as.character(Species))
```
####Problem 1
```{r}
filling = function(x) {
  
  if (is.numeric(x)) {
    x[is.na(x)] = mean(x, na.rm = TRUE)

  }else if (!is.numeric(x)) {
     x[is.na(x)] = "virginica" 
    }
    
  x
}

output = map_dfr(iris_with_missing, filling)
```
